english.verse1: You are beautiful beyond description. Too marvelous for words. Too wonderful for comprehension. Like nothing ever seen or heard.
english.verse2: Who can grasp Your infinite wisdom? Who can fathom the depth of Your love? You are beautiful beyond description. Majesty, enthroned above.
english.verse3: You are beautiful beyond description. Yet God crushed You for my sin. In agony and deep affliction. Cut off that I might enter in.
english.verse4: Who can grasp such tender compassion? Who can fathom this mercy so free? You are beautiful beyond description. Lamb of God who died for me.
english.chorus: And I stand, I stand in awe of You. I stand, I stand in awe of You. Holy God, to whom all praise is due. I stand in awe of You.

chord.verse1: C G F C C G F G (Em)
chord.verse2: Am7 F C G C G F G C
chord.verse3: C G F C C G F G (Em)
chord.verse4: Am7 F C G C G F G C
chord.chorus: C G F C G F Am7 G Am7 G F Dm7 G C G F
